Participant experiences issues scrolling after Meta AI displays an answer. The visual display is stuck and will not allow participant to scroll either up or down to get to the answer.
Participant doesn’t like that Meta adds his filler words when he is dictating a message in WhatsApp. Explains that ”it makes me very aware of them”.
Participant states Spotify audio quality is worse then headphones but “quite good”.
Participant states Meta said message said it was too long to read. Participant then asked Meta to read the message but Meta said it could not read messages outside of the 30 second window.
